articles.title: Rivian Stock Popped 15% Thursday, but There Could Be Room to Run
articles.mainIdea: Rivian Stock Popped 15% Thursday, but There Could Be Room to Run
articles.summary: Motley Fool: Rivian Stock Popped 15% Thursday, but There Could Be Room to Run. Rivian received a vote of confidence and a boost in stock price recently. Here's why there could be more room to run.

articles.summary: Motley Fool: This Contrarian Play Could Be Your Best Investment of 2026. Rivian appears to be an attractive contrarian pick for 2026, given its strong financials, robust balance sheet, and mass market catalyst.

articles.title: Rivian Stock: The EV Recovery Play to Watch
articles.mainIdea: Rivian Stock: The EV Recovery Play to Watch
articles.summary: Motley Fool: Rivian Stock: The EV Recovery Play to Watch. Rivian's stock has soared over the last four weeks, but its true test will be the release of its upcoming SUV.
